commit.title: need to use artifactID when declaring the source and javadoc jars, or else _2.9.1 will be missing in the ivy.xml, and publish-local won't work.
different env var for proxy publishing
allow publish-to-github's remote repo to be overridden
oops, make it work even with an empty set
expose a way to narrow the set of config files to validate
dont validate config files by default. make it a setting in the project file to turn on.
ProjectDependencies: also call the sub project parent.
automatically validate config files during package-dist
add the ability to substitute in the source control revision number in packaged scripts
turn off project deps when publishing a release
i think this is what mark meant to do.
scala 2.7 can't take a message with @deprecated
get rid of code duplication that caused confusion
Moving generate-ensime into the EnsimeGenerator trait.
it's vs its is my most common typo.
Make the generate-ensime task part of StandardProject. Also include an overridable blacklist.
add branch name and last few commits to build.properties
use more recent version in example :)
extend to StandardTestableProject so it can be used with android.
runpath generation depends on copyResources, compile
Publish source and javadocs by default now
build the readme separately if we're not building an index.html. factor out copyMarkdown.
copy over doc/ folder too. build markdown files if we find them in site/ or doc/.
don't try to document thrift-generated code.
clean up template a bit more.
move index template into its own file. copy over site/ if it exists.
checkin: many fixes for project dependencies, intransitive compiles
making "sbt idea" automatic turned out to be a terrible idea. don't do it.
projectCache improvements, query parents for everything.
add IntransitiveDependencies to properly allow for intransitive
don't query other repositories if we're using artifactory
magic file for detecting nested projects.
ReleaseManagement: embed full package details into the tags/commits,
initial hobo site publishing task added
we no longer compile thrift idl apparently
define a localRepos which gets included even if you're using a proxy. make the local repo and libs/ be in that list.
rework DefaultRepos so that if you specify a proxy, or are in twitter, you use that proxy instead of the default repo set
try to simplify default repos first
tricksy: if IdeaProject is loaded, make update also do the idea update
remove thrift support so it can be in sbt-thrift
making ivy style checking against artifactory optional
performance enhancements for CompileFinagleThrift: (1) buffer output
add a flag per dependency to allow it to be unpublished
always use full dependencies when generating the module for the
allow inlining and path to be settable by the project
also proxy repositories in wrapped project
deal more gracefully with proxied properties.
adhoc inlines: subproject support, support noInline() again.
add -Xmigration and -encoding utf8 to the defaults
add "relativePath()" as a rich ModuleID modifier in order to indicate
use projectDirectory instead of project names because names aren't
adding ivy style artifactory repo.  Which is sad
added CompileThrift back into StandardProject; code style changes
including -deprecation as a standard compile option
added StandardLibraryProject and StandardServiceProject, other minor improvements
CompileThrift and PackageDist no longer part of StandardProject, can be mixed in
allow SBT_ADHOC_INLINE_PATH to set the search path
remove -SNAPSHOT since that doesn't work on standard-project itself. (chicken vs egg)
moving private ivy repo behind SBT_TWITTER guard
adding ivy style resolver for DefaultRepos and Tartifactory
not publishing this plugin to artifactory. Adding back password prompts for artifactory deploy in Tartifactory trait
more flexible, eliminating dependency on external repos when using artifactory
this is so evil. but it works.
make filterScalaJars default off. fix the scala-library double-include bug. complain if your "organisation" field looks incorrect.
add another inline() variant allowing for the specification of a
adding ensime generator, bumping version to snapshot
add version checking code to inline dependencies.
avoid the transitive dependency overlap bug
Rename 'env' val in StandardProject so that it does not conflict with 'env' val in IdeaProject (https://github.com/mpeltonen/sbt-idea)
check that lib_managed/ exists before trying to compile. bump to 0.7.13.
put 0.8.1 version number in the banner.
sbt run & sbt console now depend on writing the build.properties file, and add the resources folder to the classpath so that the server startup can find it.
remove dead repos. add jboss for netty.
Set the svn binary diff folder to not be LATEST which makes no sense
fix "publish-release" to call "+publish" as a process, so all scala versions get built.
comment out reucon for now. it's missing.
don't ask for an svn password unless the .svnrepo file was loaded.
don't need to list local-libs twice.
bumping to 0.8.0-SNAPSHOT, support publishing this project to both svn and artifactoyr
Local transitive deps now resolve appropriately.
add maven2 support to the local repo. bump to 0.7.6.
change the ivysvn location to maven.twttr.com
Add the ability for standard project to publish itself via svn
Tell the svn publisher to clobber the contents of LATEST upon publish.
move git and version stuff to discrete files
always use maven-style in the private repo.
try cleaning up the svn repo.
just in case this is confusing.
fix copy-scripts to preserve the directory structure on copy. bump to 0.5.15.
changed ivy svn thinger to be m2 compatible (for pom resolution).  Added a twitterPrivateM2 style repo so we can get transitive dependencies
make THRIFT_BIN override-able, and add VERSION substitution.
add a compiler warning from the dark recesses of freels' mind.
fix name of the local-libs repo.
anchor the zip at a shallow point for capistrano. bump to 0.5.8.
prompt for password when not defined in ~/.svnrepo
mark harrah had a nice optimization.
this works but does not please me.
add rules for thrift generation, and bump to 0.2.
ed's right; we should leave lib_managed/ alone for now. sbt is getting confused and needing another "update" each time it vanishes.
checkpoint: builds executable jar, and fills in most of dist (everything but scripts).
fix merge conflict. add "testing" repo correctly.
Tell ivy to compute md5/sha1 checksums
Initial pass at a task to publish an ivy repo into dist/repo
re-do dist/zipping, add a build.properties file
remove dependency on configgy, and use env vars instead.
port over a janky way to create a monolthic jar w/ deps

issues.title: Allow for compiling test-only Thrift classes

move index template into its own file. copy over site/ if it exists.
Introduces Artifactory traits for using Artifactory
The 'env' val in StandardProject conflicts with an 'env' val in the IdeaProject sbt plugin
